QuestData.Title: The Agony and the Darkness
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n. I've deciphered the Legion missive and uncovered the demons' strategic plans for this Peninsula. Apparently, there is a large group of hellish terrorfiends gathering near the Pools of Aggonar in the west. We cannot allow such a force to go unchallenged. You must go there and decimate their cursed numbers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magister Bloodhawk wants you to kill 10 Terrorfiends in the Pools of Aggonar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $C - have the terrorfiends been defeated?
QuestData.RewardText: Bravo, $N. I knew you would be victorious! The Legion's defeat draws ever nearer!
